name: Jennifer Tacheff
title: Head of Platform & Capital Strategy
bio: Jennifer is a fund and growth architect who builds the ecosystems around founders and capital. At PWV, she leads platform and capital strategy — spanning investor relations, innovation, and growth — to help founders get seen, backed, and scaled. She’s coached 600+ founders, launched global programs with Google Accelerator and SXSW, and advised funds on capital and growth strategy. Her edge: architecting the systems where founders, investors, and ideas turn into markets.
hoverLine: Ecosystem architect. Founder whisperer. Capital strategist.
